reviewText: This was exactly what I wanted, all the stories like El Generalito and La Valentina. It was just extremely impressive and inspiring.

Unfortunately, there isn't a DVD movie for the 2nd Part (MORE STORIES OF PANCHO VILLA/MAS CUENTOS DE PANCHO VILLA), but we have this "Pancho Villa y la Valentina". It still follows the way of the 1st movie (THIS WAS PANCHO VILLA/ASI ERA PANCHO VILLA); the stories are really interesting and it really shows who Pancho Villa was. In all fareness, we should know more about him, and not just think he was a "bandido" or a bad guy, as History has shown, there is ALWAYS a reason for an action to take place, nothing happens just because...
Again, FULL SCREEN version and subtitles available as well.
VIVA VILLA!!!!!
